p: hAdV infections in HSCT recipients and in other severely immunocompromised hosts may be the consequence of new contact with the virus or the reactivation of endogenous infections [ 6]. In immunocompromised and HSCT pediatric recipients, hAdV is associated with severe complications and mortality. hAdV infections are less common in adult patients (incidence range: 1â€“30%) [ 6, 11].
